DOC.brief_summary: The general hypothesis research patient undergone treatment Head Neck Cancer decrease quality life experience depression fatigue . Increasing sustain physical activity patient improve emotional well-being , increase immunological response , improve wound healing , lessen fatigue improve general functionality quality life . The purpose study : ( 1 ) determine effectiveness 12-week exercise intervention program increase physical activity head neck cancer patient ; ( 2 ) determine physically active patient differ quality life , depression fatigue course study ; ( 3 ) determine change physical activity level relate change immune response human .
DOC.brief_title: Increasing Physical Activity Patients With Head Neck Cancer ( I-PAP Study )
DOC.detailed_description: No data report . No subject enrol
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients 19 year age ( Nebraska legal age ) . 2 . Patients diagnose HNC see University Nebraska Medical Center . 3 . Patients undergone chemotherapy , radiation and/or surgery cancer . 4 . Patients complete cancer treatment least 3 month prior . 5 . Patients consent participate study approval physician . 6 . Patients significant mental impairment . 1 . Patients enteral feeding . 2 . Patients able walk whose surgeon report walk advisable . 3 . Patients diagnose Lymphoma , Thyroid cancer Melanoma . 4 . Patients antidepressant medication . 5 . Patients unwilling return clinic end study 12 week intervention . 6 . Patients participate another research study involve therapeutic intervention . 7 . Patients chronic medical orthopedic condition would preclude physical activity ( e.g. , congestive heart failure , recent knee hip replacement ) . 8 . Patients 18 month start cancer treatment .
